thread.section_title: The Logo Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Logo Company | thelogocompany.net
thread.title: Jeff
thread.title_full: The Logo Company reviewed by Jeff

author: Jeff
title: Jeff
text: I have used The Logo Company for 3 different logo projects. I have been very pleased with their work, they seemed to read my mind when I asked for revisions, and they were always prompt, and on time. I would not use anyone else to help create our logos, and you can bet that when we start our next business, The Logo Company will create our logo!
